availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bullitt County, Kentucky, laborer. Kentucky native. Married to Mellisa Jane Troutman on April 21, 1859. Father of James Troutman, Mollie Troutman, and Charles Troutman. Laborer in Bullitt County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 205. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, District no. 3, p. 800. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McLean County, p. 41. Kentucky County Marriage Records 1783-1965, Bullitt County, 1859-1866. Find A Grave, "William Troutman (1838-1916)," Memorial #46693573, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/46693573 (accessed August 29, 2018).
